name: Boomchick
description:
In this game you take control of Boomchick. 
Lead the cute round chicken through various levels and try to reach the end as fast as possible. 
Accelerate, change your trajectory and do all sorts of crazy things by throwing stuff.
While on your way, you will meet numerous enemies you'll need to avoid using your skill and dexterity. 
If you want more levels, make them using our level editor and share them with the world!

After 9 years 6 month  in development it will hopefully have been worth the wait.

https://discord.gg/vWqWMFx our Discord server with frequent updates and work in progress stuff

  • Maxim Loboda - Code
  • Lev Kamenskiy - Gamedesign\Presentation
  • James Lee - Audio
  • DigitalFudge - Artwork

Special thanks to excore for helping  with code in the early stages of development

Made with Godot
